ovdesc.p: This table is used to define ranges or lists of currency or company codes. The data specified can be used to restrict the use of particular limit records.

Records can be defined for either COMPANY or CURRENCY, and may be specified as a list of values, or a series of ranges. These records can be utilised on the LIMIT record in the fields ALLOWED.CCY, RESTRICTED.CCY, ALLOWED.COMP, RESTRICTED.COMP.

It will allow setting up of "standard", often used or vitual views as a help or short cut in the Limit definition process. (eg. certain limits may be valid only for EEC currencies, so a record grouping the currencies in question can be defined).

desc.p: Reserved for future use.
System field, no input.
Defines the start value for a range of values.
This field together with END.VALUE allows ranges of CURRENCY or COMPANY codes to be specified.
2-9 alpha numeric characters Multi value field Optional Input
If COMP.OR.CCY is specified as COMPANY, the value can be input as the 2-3 character company mnemonic, or the full 9 character company code.
If COMP.OR.CCY is specified as COMPANY, the company should be a financial company. Branches are not allowed.
If COMP.OR.CCY is specified as CURRENCY, the value can be input in standard currency format.
The value must be greater than the END.VALUE in the last multi value set.
Both DISCR.VALUE and a range of values (using START.VALUE and END.VALUE) cannot be specified together.
